00010 #ifndef TS_DBC_HPP
00011 #define TS_DBC_HPP
00012 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00013 
00014 #include <iostream>
00015 #include <string>
00016 #include <stdexcept>
00017 #include <sstream>
00018 
00019 namespace tranSupport {
00020 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00021 
00023 class tranError : public std::logic_error {
00024 
00025 public:
00027    tranError(std::string const &msg) : std::logic_error(msg)
00028       { /* * */ }
00029 
00030    virtual ~tranError() throw() // don't allow destructor to throw an error
00031       { /* * */ }
00032 };
00033 
00035 //* Called by Require, Check, and Ensure
00036 inline void throwError( const char assertType[], const char theCode[],
00037                         const char fileName[], int lineNumber)
00038 {
00039    std::ostringstream errorString;
00040    errorString << "Assertion \"" << assertType << "\" failed in file <"
00041          << fileName << "> line " << lineNumber << ":\n"
00042          << "\t" << theCode << "\n";
00043 
00044    throw tranError(errorString.str());
00045 }
00046 
00048 inline void throwInsist(const char theMessage[], const char fileName[], 
00049                         int lineNumber)
00050 {
00051    std::ostringstream errorString;
00052    errorString << "Insist failed in file <"
00053          << fileName << "> line " << lineNumber << ":\n"
00054          << "\t" << theMessage << "\n";
00055 
00056    throw tranError(errorString.str());
00057 
00058 }
00059 
00060 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00061 }
00062 /*============================================================================*/
00063 
00065 // will never be turned off
00066 #define Insist(cond, msg) if (!(cond)) tranSupport::throwInsist(msg, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00067 
00069 #if DBC & 1
00070 #define Require(cond) if (!(cond)) tranSupport::throwError("Require", #cond, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00071 #else
00072 #define Require(cond)
00073 #endif
00074 
00076 #if DBC & 2
00077 #define Check(cond) if (!(cond)) tranSupport::throwError("Check", #cond, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00078 #else
00079 #define Check(cond)
00080 #endif
00081 
00083 #if DBC & 4
00084 #define Ensure(cond) if (!(cond)) tranSupport::throwError("Ensure", #cond, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00085 #else
00086 #define Ensure(cond)
00087 #endif
00088 
00089 /*============================================================================*/
00091 #define PRINTINT(code)    std::printf("Result of {%s}: %d\n",    #code, (code))
00092 
00094 #define PRINTDOUBLE(code) std::printf("Result of {%s}: %.16e\n", #code, (code))
